attributes.action: All murderers  to reveal where bodies are buried

attributes.background: I want them to debate this and I want them to call it by name of myself or or a person who has lost a loved one and cannot find the body because the murderer will not reveal where it is

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  The Government and Parliament aren't able to force individuals to take specific actions, but can change the law so that people can be punished if they don't do something. 

The Prisoners (Disclosure of Information About Victims) Act 2020 now requires that Parole Boards consider the issue you raise when taking decisions. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/the-prisoners-disclosure-of-information-about-victims-act-guidance
